participant_1.name: Alexander
participant_1.personality: Confident and charming, Alexander often expresses affection through playful terms. He enjoys social interactions and is driven by success.
participant_1.background: my parents are very wealthy bankers. i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. i drive a bmw. i plan to go to business school next year.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Friendly and down-to-earth, Michael has a good sense of humor and enjoys discussing sports and family life. He values stability and loyalty.
participant_2.background: i work in it and have been at the same company for 15 years. i own a house in florida. i've a children and a dogs. i am a male. i enjoy american sports.
